name: ALLBLACK Ch.3
description:
This visual novel covers Chapter 3 of ALLBLACK Light Novel. This is a direct continuation of Chapter 2 published beforehand. There are 6 chapters in total. Additional chapter will be added in the future.

DETAILS

  • Format : Kinetic Novel
  • Genre : Action, psychological, sci-fi
  • Length : 10k words, about 30-40 minutes reading
  • Language : English
  • Platform : PC (Windows, Mac, Linux) and Android (4.4 and up)

TEAM

  • Original story : fsc
  • VN Adaptation : TNR 
  • Editor and Proofreader : S.B Hunter and David Pardy

QUESTION TO ALL READERS

  1.  How did you enjoy the VN overall?
  2. What is your opinion about the characters so far? (mainly, the protagonist)
  3. What can I improve on future release? (user-experience related)
  4. If the final story is about 6 hours long, is it worth to release it as commercial? Would you willing to buy it and how much will you pay?

Honest feedback are greatly appreciated. Thank you!
